HUMAN.name: Human
HUMAN.description: Baseline humans are plain, ordinary people distributed across thousands of worlds, cultures and environments. Their appearance, customs and outlook on life can vary tremendously.
characteristics: Can exceed 1 point of Luck
Adaptable: +1 to rolls when attempting something for the first time

ENGINEER.name: Engineer
ENGINEER.description: Slim humanoids with a fragile physique. They have an innate talent for interfacing with machinery.
characteristics: +1 to repair rolls
+2 to identify technological artifacts
Cannot exceed Toughness 4

KERIN.name: K'Erin
KERIN.description: Proud and warlike aliens with a penchant for brutality and a peculiar sense of honor.
characteristics: Roll twice for Brawling, pick better result
Must move to engage enemies within base movement in Brawling
+1 damage with melee weapons

SOULLESS.name: Soulless
SOULLESS.description: A species of cybernetic organisms, connected into a combined hive-intelligence.
characteristics: 6+ Armor Saving Throw
Cannot use consumables or receive implants
Use Bot injury table
Can learn from experience and receive XP normally
Can have Bot Upgrades at 1.5x cost

PRECURSOR.name: Precursor
PRECURSOR.description: Graceful and refined alien humanoids who were traveling the stars when other species were still lingering in caves.
characteristics: Roll twice for Character Events and pick preferred result
Can avoid Character Event by spending 1 story point after rolling twice
Ancient Knowledge: +2 to checks involving ancient technology or history

FERAL.name: Feral
FERAL.description: Humanoid-animal hybrids, typically patterned on Earth predators. Originally engineered for military purposes, now considered an independent species.
characteristics: Ignore enemy-imposed penalties to Seize the Initiative rolls
Must be given single 1 on Reaction Roll if possible
Predator Instinct: +1 to tracking and hunting checks
background_options: Pack Hunter: +1 when fighting alongside allies
Alpha: +1 to Leadership among other Ferals

SWIFT.name: Swift
SWIFT.description: Diminutive, winged, lizard people who received their nickname due to their erratic, jerky motions.
characteristics: Can glide down safely at distance equal to height difference
Can leap gaps up to 4 inches wide
Can jump from any height without damage
Must direct all weapon shots at same target
background_options: Messenger: +1 to Speed when delivering messages
Nest Defender: +1 when defending home territory

BOT.name: Bot
BOT.description: Typical Bots are built to a bewildering array of configurations, but this profile fits most combat, security and multi-purpose Bots.
characteristics: 6+ Armor Saving Throw
Use separate injury table
Cannot earn XP - must be upgraded with credits
Cannot use implants or consumables
Cannot be subject to Character Events

MILITARY.name: Military
MILITARY.description: Former member of a military organization, with training in combat and tactics.
special_abilities: Combat Training: +1 to hit with military weapons

CRIMINAL.name: Criminal
CRIMINAL.description: Former or current member of the criminal underworld, with connections and street smarts.
special_abilities: Underworld Contacts: +2 to find illegal goods or information

ACADEMIC.name: Academic
ACADEMIC.description: Educated in formal institutions, with knowledge in various scientific fields.
special_abilities: Scientific Method: +2 to analyze unknown phenomena

COLONIST.name: Colonist
COLONIST.description: Raised on a frontier colony, with practical skills for survival.
special_abilities: Resourceful: Can improvise tools from available materials

CORPORATE.name: Corporate
CORPORATE.description: Former employee of a major corporation, with business acumen and connections.
special_abilities: Corporate Connections: +2 to acquire legal goods or services

DRIFTER.name: Drifter
DRIFTER.description: Wanderer who has traveled extensively, picking up various skills along the way.
special_abilities: Adaptable: +1 to all rolls in unfamiliar situations

COMBAT.name: Melee Combat
COMBAT.description: Proficiency with close combat weapons and unarmed fighting.

levels.effect: +1 to hit with melee weapons
+1 damage with melee weapons
Parry: Reduce incoming melee damage by 1

COMBAT.name: Shooting
COMBAT.description: Skill with ranged weapons and marksmanship.

levels.effect: +1 to hit with ranged weapons
Aim: +2 to hit when spending an action to aim
Called Shot: Target specific body parts

COMBAT.name: Tactics
COMBAT.description: Knowledge of battlefield strategies and positioning.

levels.effect: +1 to initiative rolls
Coordinate: Grant +1 to an ally's attack
Battlefield Control: Reposition one enemy or ally

TECHNICAL.name: Repair
TECHNICAL.description: Ability to fix damaged equipment and machinery.

levels.effect: Repair 1D6 damage to equipment
Field Repair: Repair without proper tools
Upgrade: Improve equipment performance

TECHNICAL.name: Electronics
TECHNICAL.description: Knowledge of electronic systems and computers.

levels.effect: +2 to operate or bypass electronic systems
Hack: Access secured computer systems
Override: Take control of automated systems

TECHNICAL.name: Medicine
TECHNICAL.description: Knowledge of medical procedures and treatments.

levels.effect: Heal 1D6 health points
Stabilize: Prevent death from critical injuries
Surgery: Treat serious injuries without penalty

KNOWLEDGE.name: Science
KNOWLEDGE.description: Knowledge of scientific principles and research methods.

levels.effect: +2 to analyze unknown phenomena
Research: Gain information about specific topics
Breakthrough: Develop new solutions to problems

KNOWLEDGE.name: Xenology
KNOWLEDGE.description: Knowledge of alien species, cultures, and biology.

levels.effect: +2 to identify alien species and their traits
Communication: Understand alien languages
Cultural Expert: Predict alien behavior and customs

KNOWLEDGE.name: Navigation
KNOWLEDGE.description: Skill in plotting courses and reading star charts.

levels.effect: +2 to navigate unfamiliar terrain or space
Shortcut: Find faster routes between locations
Stellar Cartography: Map unknown regions accurately

SOCIAL.name: Negotiation
SOCIAL.description: Skill in bargaining and reaching favorable agreements.

levels.effect: +2 to all negotiation checks
Haggle: Reduce prices by 20%
Deal Maker: Negotiate favorable terms in any deal

SOCIAL.name: Leadership
SOCIAL.description: Ability to inspire and direct others effectively.

levels.effect: +1 to all ally morale checks
Inspire: Grant one ally an extra action
Command: Coordinate team attacks for bonus damage

SOCIAL.name: Streetwise
SOCIAL.description: Knowledge of criminal elements and urban survival.

levels.effect: +2 to find information or contacts in urban areas
Black Market: Access to illegal goods and services
Criminal Network: Call in favors from criminal contacts

SURVIVAL.name: Stealth
SURVIVAL.description: Ability to move undetected and avoid notice.

levels.effect: +2 to stealth checks
Silent Movement: Move without making noise
Vanish: Disappear from sight during combat

SURVIVAL.name: Survival
SURVIVAL.description: Skills focusing on surviving in hostile environments

skills.name: Tracking
skills.description: Ability to track enemies and wildlife

skills.name: Foraging
skills.description: Find food and supplies in the wilderness
